================

This module is mandatory when using the *role_policy* app in combination with the Odoo standard addons Sale module.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

You will find a demonstration about how to configure and use this module in this `screencast <https://youtu.be/uKnCnZhX2KM>`_.

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/role-policy/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/role-policy/issues/new?body=module:%20role_policy_sale%0Aversion:%2013.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
